p.codeblock: typedef struct Rect { int top; int left; int bottom; int right; Rect(): top(0), left(0), bottom(0), right(0) {} Rect(int t, int l, int b, int r): top(t), left(l), bottom(b), right(r) {} } Rect;
export interface Rect { top: number; left: number; bottom: number; right: number; }

dlentry.dd: This class is deprecated. Please use the method to update the shared area.

plentry.pd: The coordinate of the top side of the shared area on the vertical axis.
The coordinate of the left side of the shared area on the horizontal axis.
The coordinate of the bottom side of the shared area on the vertical axis.
The coordinate of the right side of the shared area on the horizontal axis.
